examples.korean: We united around him as the pivotal figure[he played the pivotal role]. 발음듣기 우리는 그를 구심점으로 똘똘 뭉쳤다 Neungyule
examples.english: We united around him as the pivotal figure[he played the pivotal role]. 발음

examples.korean: The collapse of Soviet communism removed the essential glue that had since 1945 bound together the many strands of American policy. 발음듣기 소련 공산 체제가 무너지면서 1945년 이후 미국 정책을 통합시켜 온 근본적인 구심점이 없어졌다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The collapse of Soviet communism removed the essential glue that had since 1945 bound together the many strands of American policy. 발음

examples.korean: Governments yes, sure - they are pivitol. 발음듣기 네, 물론 정부가 구심점이죠. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 당근당근(rsh2****) Web Collection
examples.english: Governments yes, sure - they are pivitol. 발음

examples.korean: The one commonality, regardless of sect is a centrality of the Quran and viewing that as the actual word of God. 발음듣기 분파에 상관없이 한가지 공통성은 코란이 구심점으로 그것을 신의 실제 말씀으로 본다는 점입니다. Khan Academy
examples.english: The one commonality, regardless of sect is a centrality of the Quran and viewing that as the actual word of God. 발음
